channel.title: Extra Large (XL) – Indigenous Values Initiative
channel.description: NYA WEÑHA SKÄ NOÑH: Thank you for being well

item.title: Youth Gray T-Shirt
item.dc:creator: Adam DJ Brett
item.description: Nike Tru-Fit Youth Gray Commemorative Deyhontsigwa’ehs- The Creator’s Game, Lacrosse Weekend 2017 t-shirt with the creator's game image on the front and the Indigenous Values Initiative and Wooden Stick Festival logos on the sleeves. The origins of lacrosse come from the Haudenosaunee and all funds from your tax-free purchases go to promote the Indigenous values of this game.
item.content:encoded: Nike Tru-Fit Youth Gray Commemorative Deyhontsigwa’ehs- The Creator’s Game, Lacrosse Weekend 2017 t-shirt with the creator’s game image on the front and the Indigenous Values Initiative and Wooden Stick Festival logos on the sleeves.
